result.markdown: --- title: "Week 5: Accuracy evaluation" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Fitted values, residuals * Distributional forecasts * Forecast evaluation ## Pre-class activities Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html), Sections 5.4 -- 5.5, 5.8 -- 5.10, and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 8-10, 12 from [Section 5.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox-exercises.html). ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in lecture](seminar_code.R) ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) [Code used in workshop](workshop_code.R) ## Assignments * [Assignment 2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Thursday 17 April. ## Weekly quiz * [Week 5 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868370) is due on Sunday 06 April.
